Name: Major Whiskertron
Description: Hailing from the neon-lit alleyways of Digitalis Purrth, Major Whiskertron is a valiant cybernetic feline soldier known for his rosso corsa armor that glows with the intensity of a thousand laser pointers. His screen displays the fierce eyes of a warrior cat, ever watchful and ready to pounce on any cyber threats. With button commands that unleash a symphony of meows and roars, and limbs engineered for agility and strength, Major Whiskertron is a beloved member of the elite WebtrES club. He spends his downtime chasing digital mice and sharpening his tactical algorithms.
